WorkItem.Description:
If in any way a text node ends up with _outerchanged == true (setting an attribute will set this flag to true, for example) and _text == null, getting OuterHTML causes a StackOverflow:
Â 
(HtmlTextNode)OuterHTML_get() ->base.OuterHTML_get() -> WriteTo() -> WriteTo(StringWriter) -> (HtmlTextNode).Text_get() -> (HtmlTextNode)OuterHTML_get()
WorkItem.Summary: Setting attributes on a text node causes StackOverflow

Comments.Message: I came across this because I blindly ran `RemoveAll()` on the `HtmlAttributeCollection` of an entire node tree, including text nodes.
